com.davidbracewell.scripting

Class ScriptEnvironmentManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.davidbracewell.scripting.ScriptEnvironmentManager

  • public final class ScriptEnvironmentManager
extends Object
    Manages scripting environments giving each language a singleton instance.
    Author:
    David B. Bracewell

    • Method Summary
